content: **this pattern is undergoing review for an update and is currently unavailable ** whether they re tackling the jungle gym wrestling with wild stuffed animals or cuddling up after a long day of exploring the go get em tiger sweater will accompany them in comfort and style knit up in an ultra-cozy dk merino this play-friendly sweater features happy stripes movement-friendly yoke shaping and an ungendered design so you can pass it down for years to come **yarn** main colour 1 skein - shown in peachy penelope contrast colour 1 skein - shown in the duel *or 120 168 210 242 270 326 yd in each of two colours of similar dk-weight yarn * **tools and notions** for ribbing 3 5 mm us 4 circular needle or 0 5mm smaller than gauge needle plus your preferred format for small circumferences for yoke body and sleeves 4 mm us 5 circular needle plus your preferred format for small circumferences stitch marker to indicate beginning of round two stitch holders or waste yarn for placing sleeve stitches on hold tapestry needle to weave in ends **sizes** 3-6 mo 6 - 12 mo 1-2 yr 3-4 yr 5-6 yr 7-8 yr finished circumference at underarms 17 5 19 75 22 24 25 26 5 28 75 choosing a size aim for 2-3 of ease in the chest and if desired double the length of the cuff so the sweater can grow along with the child
